Verifies that making cross origin requests with SameSite=Lax cookies sends us Network.RequestWillBeSentExtraInfo events with corresponding blocked cookies.

Browser initiated navigation blocked cookies: [
  {
    "blockedReasons": [],
    "cookie": {
      "name": "name",
      "value": "value",
      "domain": "cookie.test",
      "path": "/inspector-protocol/network/resources",
      "expires": -1,
      "size": 9,
      "httpOnly": false,
      "secure": false,
      "session": true,
      "sameSite": "Lax",
      "priority": "Medium"
    }
  }
]

Javascript initiated navigation blocked cookies: [
  {
    "blockedReasons": [],
    "cookie": {
      "name": "name",
      "value": "value",
      "domain": "cookie.test",
      "path": "/inspector-protocol/network/resources",
      "expires": -1,
      "size": 9,
      "httpOnly": false,
      "secure": false,
      "session": true,
      "sameSite": "Lax",
      "priority": "Medium"
    }
  }
]

Javascript initiated subresource blocked cookies: [
  {
    "blockedReasons": [
      "SameSiteLax"
    ],
    "cookie": {
      "name": "name",
      "value": "value",
      "domain": "cookie.test",
      "path": "/inspector-protocol/network/resources",
      "expires": -1,
      "size": 9,
      "httpOnly": false,
      "secure": false,
      "session": true,
      "sameSite": "Lax",
      "priority": "Medium"
    }
  }
]
